name: Authenthic Dodgeball
description:
Authenthic Dodgeball game is a final-project course "Game development"

This game test and work on mobile(android and iphone) and pc.

We very recommender to play multiplayer with you frinend.. 

Developers:

Aviv vexler, Jessica fliker and Omri yonatani.

How to play?

pc:

Player1 (Left player)
- use WASD to move up down left and right. (circled in white)
- use E to catch the ball (circled in blue)
- use Q to throw the ball (circled in blue)
- use alpha numbers ( numbers on the top of the keyboard) to choose your player (circled in red)

Player2 (Right player)

- use arrows to move up down left and right (circled in white)
- use L to throw the ball (circled in blue)
- use P to catch the ball (circled in blue)
- use the number pad numbers (numbers on the right of the keyboard) to choose your player (circled in red)

Mobile:

Drag and drop. Red buttons to throw and catch.
